verbose_text: Therefore, EGCG can significantly attenuate the effect of I/R injury as displayed by lower phosphorylation levels of IkappaB-alpha and p65 (p-IkappaB-alpha and p-p65) and the lower degradation level of IkappaB-alpha in the EGCG group than in the IRI group (P < 0.05).
evidence: EGCG can significantly attenuate the effect of I/R injury
